name: D&D Combat Table & Simulator
short_description:
A combat simulator application for pen&paper style game, D&D.
It will be as generic as possible to support different versions or even other games but initial version will target D&D 3.5 SRD.

Expected Features:
 - Script Execution, game rules are to be all implemented as scripts, application will (almost) calculate every case and show proper combat attributes
 - XML based scripting, for simplicity and an easy cross-game portable language, all scripts will be written in a special XML scheme. nothing hardcoded
 - In detail combat table view, application will support 2 table views (nothing other than a grid of squares actually) for players and DMs in 2 different windows (multi monitors? aww yess)
 - Whole combat execution EXCEPT actions, all actions should be managed by DM, if a monster !!needs!! to make more than 2 standard action, no restriction
 -  Interactive dice rolls, player wants to roll d20? let him do and enter it into the action die roll
